main event: Multiple USAF personnel reported observing a bright blue object moving rapidly in the sky over Taos, New Mexico, on 17 October 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as larger than a falling star and emitted a bluish-green flash when it disappeared,The estimated speed of the object was about 2500 mph,Observations were made by multiple witnesses at different locations,Observers included several military personnel from Kirtland AFB,The sighting lasted only 2-3 seconds.
witness description: USAF personnel including 2nd Lieutenants and Majors
